body:
This would be an extraordinarily useful feature. There's currently some weird brigade of users flooding the site with complaints about censorship, while providing no concrete examples, essentially achieving de facto censorship of content via spam.

Is there a way of adding users to a "block list" so that you don't see any of their posts or comments? It would help immensely. I am pretty sure the project codebase is open source and I have some intermediate dev chops, so I'd be happy to help implement this feature if there's any interest.

Who approves updates to the code base? It doesn't help that the founders are all anonymous (as far as I can tell).

Edit: Thank you for everyone who helped, it has made the site great again and works exactly as I was hoping. Discord spam BTFO eternally

body:
Yes, this was a feature that was here almost from the start.

You could block guilds AND users...  

However, now the administrators have decided to block some things FOR you... before you see them.  Wasn't that nice of them?

Very proactive...

Edit: Thank you for everyone who helped, it has made the site great again and works exactly as I was hoping. Discord spam BTFO eternally
